summary: Mobile responsiveness testing completed successfully for Pricing, How It Works, and Calculator pages. All three pages render properly on mobile (375px), iPhone 12 (414px), tablet (768px), and desktop (1920px) viewports. No horizontal scroll issues detected on any viewport. All responsive breakpoints (sm:, lg:) working correctly.

console_errors.issue: React hydration warning: Invalid HTML nesting - span inside tbody in the comparisons table mapping
console_errors.impact: Does not affect visual rendering or functionality. Previously documented in iteration_3.

passed_tests: PRICING PAGE - Mobile (375px): No horizontal scroll, hero text readable, pricing cards stack vertically
PRICING PAGE - Mobile (375px): Employee Fee Structure section displays correctly with proper padding
PRICING PAGE - Mobile (375px): Comparison table horizontally scrollable (min-w-[600px])
PRICING PAGE - Mobile (375px): Employer section renders with stacked grid layout
PRICING PAGE - Mobile (375px): FAQ section renders with proper text sizing
PRICING PAGE - Mobile (375px): CTA buttons full-width and properly sized
HOW IT WORKS PAGE - Mobile (375px): Hero section with responsive text (text-3xl sm:text-5xl)
HOW IT WORKS PAGE - Mobile (375px): Benefits bar displays as 2-column grid on mobile
HOW IT WORKS PAGE - Mobile (375px): Step infographics scaled down with sm: breakpoints
HOW IT WORKS PAGE - Mobile (375px): Step sections stack properly on mobile
HOW IT WORKS PAGE - Mobile (375px): Video section placeholder renders correctly
HOW IT WORKS PAGE - Mobile (375px): FAQ and CTA sections properly styled
CALCULATOR PAGE - Mobile (375px): Country selector displays as 4-column grid
CALCULATOR PAGE - Mobile (375px): All form inputs properly sized (h-10 sm:h-12)
CALCULATOR PAGE - Mobile (375px): Days Worked slider functional
CALCULATOR PAGE - Mobile (375px): Results panel displays correctly
CALCULATOR PAGE - Mobile (375px): Trust section icons stack properly
TABLET (768px): All three pages render without horizontal scroll
IPHONE 12 (414px): All three pages render without horizontal scroll
DESKTOP (1920px): All three pages render correctly - no regression
NAVIGATION: All links work correctly on all viewport sizes
critical_code_review_comments: PricingPage.jsx line 332-334: Low-priority React hydration warning - span wrapping tr in tbody. Use React.Fragment instead. (Previously reported)

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All mobile responsiveness fixes working correctly

context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile responsiveness fix verified across all viewports. Key responsive classes: text-2xl sm:text-4xl for text, grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 for grids, h-10 sm:h-12 for inputs. Country selector in Calculator uses grid-cols-4. Comparison table has min-w-[600px] with overflow-x-auto.
